title: Introducing Beoplay A2
description:
BeoPlay A2 is a powerful and ultra-portable Bluetooth speaker with a ground-breaking True360 omni-directional sound, up to 24 hours of battery life and a rock-solid aluminium core built for mobility and guaranteeing acoustic stability.
 
Featuring the Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound that was designed to give you honest sound the way the artists intended it – and introducing a innovative sound technology that ensures the music experience is impressive no matter where you are placed.

asset.title: Introducing Beoplay A2
asset.description:
To see more about BeoPlay A2 go to: www.beoplay.com/a2
